__e: I've just received word from my alter ego.
I know what it's like to get this news, and no one should have to get it from you.
I heard that at work instead of from you.
Damn the meaning, I'll memorize it
Yes, you had to find out from someone else, because whatever happens to you and Ben should be between you and Ben, not you and Ben and me or the whole school.
I want to know why you didn't tell me, why I had to find out from her.
I wouldn't have told you even now, but they're married. And I've seen the wedding party. How?
I'm sorry to say this, but it's too late for me to do anything for your son.
I hate to break it to you, but it's not really yours anymore.
I mean, I'm only telling you this because I've learned it, forgot it, and then I just relearned it.
